question: Who has been appointed as Chairman of Economic Advisory Council?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi constituted an Economic Advisory NITI Aayog member and a former professor at the Centre for Policy Research, Bibek Debroy has been appointed as Chairman of Economic Advisory Council. Other members of the Economic Advisory Council constituted by PM Modi are Surjit Bhalla, Rathin Roy, Ashima Goyal and Ratan Watal.
